com.espertech.esper.client
Class ConfigurationEngineDefaults

java.lang.Object
  com.espertech.esper.client.ConfigurationEngineDefaults
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ConfigurationEngineDefaults
extends Object
implements Serializable

Provides access to engine configuration defaults for modification.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.EventMeta
          Event representation metadata.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Execution
          Holds engine execution-related settings.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Expression
          Expression evaluation settings in the engine are for results of expressions.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Language
          Language settings in the engine are for string comparisons.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Logging
          Holds view logging settings other then the Apache commons or Log4J settings.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.StreamSelection
          Holds default settings for stream selection in the select-clause.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Threading
          Holds threading settings.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.TimeSource
          Time source configuration, the default in MILLI (millisecond resolution from System.currentTimeMillis).
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.TimeSourceType
          Time source type.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Variables
          Holds variables settings.
static class ConfigurationEngineDefaults.ViewResources
          Holds view resources settings.
 
Constructor Summary
protected ConfigurationEngineDefaults()
          Ctor.
 
Method Summary
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.EventMeta getEventMeta()
          Returns event representation default settings.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Execution getExecution()
          Returns statement execution-related settings, settings that influence event/schedule to statement processing.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Expression getExpression()
          Returns the expression-related settings for the engine.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Language getLanguage()
          Returns the language-related settings for the engine.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Logging getLogging()
          Returns logging settings applicable to the engine, other then Log4J settings.
 ConfigurationMetricsReporting getMetricsReporting()
          Returns the metrics reporting configuration.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.StreamSelection getStreamSelection()
          Returns engine defaults applicable to streams (insert and remove, insert only or remove only) selected for a statement.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Threading getThreading()
          Returns threading settings.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.TimeSource getTimeSource()
          Returns the time source configuration.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.Variables getVariables()
          Returns engine defaults applicable to variables.
 ConfigurationEngineDefaults.ViewResources getViewResources()
          Returns view resources defaults.
